title: Study Of Eribulin (E7389) In Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors And Normal Or Reduced Hepatic Function As Per Child-Pugh System

criteria.criterion: Significant cardiovascular impairment (history of congestive heart failure > New York Heart Association [NYHA] Grade II, unstable angina or myocardial infarction within the past six months, or serious cardiac arrhythmia)
criteria.question: What is your NYHA class?

criteria.criterion: All the general inclusion criteria listed above plus: Normal hepatic function as evidenced by bilirubin ≤ 34 μmol/l (≤2.0 mg/dL) and alkaline phosphatase, alanine transaminase (ALT), and aspartate transaminase (AST) ≤3 times the upper limits of normal (ULN) (in the case of liver metastases ≤5 x ULN), or in the case of bone metastases, the liver specific alkaline phosphatase ≤3 times the upper limits of normal (ULN), and in the case of concomitant liver metastases, ≤5 x ULN
criteria.question: What is your total bilirubin level?

criteria.criterion: Adequate bone marrow function as evidenced by absolute neutrophil count (ANC) ≥ 1.5 x 10^9/L, hemoglobin ≥ 10.0 g/dL (a hemoglobin <10.0 g/dL is acceptable if it is corrected by growth factor or transfusion), and platelet count ≥ 100 x 10^9/L
criteria.question: What is your absolute neutrophil count?

criteria.criterion: Adequate bone marrow function as evidenced by absolute neutrophil count (ANC) ≥ 1.5 x 10^9/L, hemoglobin ≥ 10.0 g/dL (a hemoglobin <10.0 g/dL is acceptable if it is corrected by growth factor or transfusion), and platelet count ≥ 100 x 10^9/L
criteria.question: What is your platelet count?

criteria.criterion: Adequate renal function as evidenced by serum creatinine ≤ 2.0 mg/dL or calculated creatinine clearance ≥ 40 mL/minute (min) per the Cockcroft and Gault formula
criteria.question: What is your calculated creatinine clearance?

criteria.criterion: Adequate renal function as evidenced by serum creatinine ≤ 2.0 mg/dL or calculated creatinine clearance ≥ 40 mL/minute (min) per the Cockcroft and Gault formula
criteria.question: What is your creatinine level?

criteria.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0, 1, or 2
criteria.question: What is your ECOG performance status?
